github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: This project is Industrial Genesis, a factory simulation game built in Godot 4.4 using C#. Always write clean, idiomatic Godot C# code.
Use component-based architecture with modular scripts and signals for communication.
Avoid putting heavy logic in _Process unless necessary for real-time updates.
Write brief doc comments on classes and methods describing their purpose.
When generating code, align with the factory simulation context: machines, conveyors, multi-input/output processing, and tech tree progression.
